Actions.Name: [RFC] Add RFC to transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description: Adds an RFC call to a transaction identified by tId and-or queue name, creating a new transaction if none exists.

Actions.Name: [BAPI] Call method in SAP (Preview)
Actions.Description: Calls the BAPI method on the SAP system.

Actions.Name: [RFC] Call function in SAP (Preview)
Actions.Description: Calls an sRFC, tRFC or qRFC on the SAP system.

Actions.Name: [BAPI - RFC] Close stateful session (Preview)
Actions.Description: Closes an existing stateful connection session to the SAP system.

Actions.Name: [BAPI] Commit transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description: Commits the BAPI transaction for the given session.

Actions.Name: [RFC] Commit transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description: Commits the RFC transaction for the given session and-or queue.

Actions.Name: [IDOC - RFC] Confirm transaction Id (Preview)
Actions.Description: Sends transaction Id confirmation to SAP.

Actions.Name: [RFC] Create transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description:
Creates a new transaction if none exists, using the provided transaction Id and-or queue name.
If the transaction exists, gets the details of the existing transaction.
The transaction Id can be provided in either GUID or 24-character string format.

Actions.Name: [BAPI - RFC] Create stateful session (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a stateful connection session to the SAP system.

Actions.Name: Generate schemas
Actions.Description: Generates XML schemas for the provided SAP action or URI.

Actions.Name: [IDOC] Get IDOC status (Preview)
Actions.Description: [IDOC] Get IDOC status.

Actions.Name: [RFC] Get transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description:
Gets the details of a transaction identified by transaction Id and-or queue name, creating a new transaction if it none exists.
The transaction Id can be provided in either GUID or 24-character string format.
Both the queue name and the transaction Id must be provided to find an existing qRFC transaction.

Actions.Name: [IDOC] Get IDOC list for transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description: Gets the list of IDOCs for the transaction identified by either session identifier GUID or transaction identifier (TID).

Actions.Name: Read SAP table (obsolete) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This action requires that the user has access to 'BBP_RFC_READ_TABLE' or 'RFC_READ_TABLE' RFC.

Actions.Name: Read SAP table (Preview)
Actions.Description: This action requires that the user has access to 'BBP_RFC_READ_TABLE' or 'RFC_READ_TABLE' RFC.

Actions.Name: [BAPI] Roll back transaction (Preview)
Actions.Description: Rolls back the BAPI transaction for the given session.

Actions.Name: Send message to SAP
Actions.Description: Sends any message type RFC, BAPI, IDOC to SAP.

Actions.Name: [IDOC] Send document to SAP (deprecated) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Sends IDOC message to SAP (deprecated).

Actions.Name: [IDOC] Send document to SAP (Preview)
Actions.Description: Sends IDOC message to SAP.

Actions.Name: [RFC] Call long-running function in SAP (Preview)
Actions.Description: Calls a long-running sRFC on the SAP system and waits for the system to respond back.

Actions.Name: When a message is received
Actions.Description: When a message is received from SAP.
